message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the potential it holds for you, I propose a price of $1400000. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a special package that includes an additional year of maintenance support free of charge. I look forward to your response.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to consider your special package with an additional year of maintenance support, but I need to stay within my budget. I look forward to your response.

Dear Bob, thank you for your interest in our product. I appreciate your budget considerations, and I understand that we're working towards finding a mutually beneficial solution. After careful deliberation, I am willing to accept a price of $1300000 for the product, along with the special package that includes an additional year of maintenance support. I believe this offer strikes a balance between the value of the product and your budget constraints. I look forward to your response.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1300000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1250000 for the product, including the special package. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits the product will bring to my business. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in our product and your effort to find a fair price. In light of your proposal, I am willing to consider $1275000 for the product, including the special package with an additional year of maintenance support. This price reflects the value of the product and the benefits it offers. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to consider my proposal. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1275000. I'm willing to offer $1225000 for the product, including the special package. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits the product will bring to my business. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $1250000 for the product, including the special package with an additional year of maintenance support. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive within the market. I hope this revised offer is acceptable and allows us to finalize the transaction.
